item.description:
Nancy Phillips, Small Business Consultant

Best Practices For Group Your Practice

 

What are best practices for growing your mind-body therapies practice?  Today's session with Small Business Consultant, Nancy Phillips, will give you an opportunity to explore ways to build your business.  Bring your questions, stories and challenges for discussion and thoughtful response.

Nancy has many years of experience helping small business owners with all aspects of starting and growing a successful business.

 

Potluck lunch begins at 11:30 am. Presentation begins at 12:15 pm.  Meetup ends at 1:15 pm,
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome them at the door
item.name: May Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
